title: First Blog Update!
author: tinyplayerss
longDescription:
Ads are a way for me as the developer and as tinyplayerss to Personally make a living and keeping HyteServe Updated with more content

Please do allow ads in your Adblockers Whitelist feature and allow me to Make a living Ads will for now be the only way to keep me living and be able to Serve Hytale Fans around the World Searching for Content that they need!

Also the Ad network I'm partnered with is Adsterra they allowed me to get Fast Ad setup right off the get go So please if you don't like ads i promise the Ads will not be in the way of any content.

I would never allow Ads that would impact the user experience.
